answers.text: to teach a migration route to a flock of birds

qas.question: What did they use to teach birds a migration route?
Which birds did they reintroduce to the US?
Which birds did they use as a trial run?

context: It has been possible <a0_0>to teach a migration route to a flock of birds<a0_0/>, for example in re-introduction schemes. After a trial with <a3_0>Canada geese<a3_0/> Branta canadensis, <a1_0>microlight aircraft<a1_0/> were used in the US to teach safe migration routes to reintroduced <a2_0>whooping cranes<a2_0/> Grus americana.
